Sentencas: Due to a strict H2S tolerance limit, an advanced H2S removal treatment (primary and polishing) is required to fuel a solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Comparing the performance of a 13X zeolite and an impregnated activated carbon for H2S removal from biogas to fuel an SOFC: Influence of water

Sentencas: With a focus on the polishing treatment, adsorption tests were performed to compare the efficiency of two commercial adsorbents: a 13X zeolite (Z) and a coal-based impregnated activated carbon (IAC).
Titulo: Comparing the performance of a 13X zeolite and an impregnated activated carbon for H2S removal from biogas to fuel an SOFC: Influence of water

Sentencas: The experiments conducted at lab-scale on a synthetic polluted gas highlighted the impact of the gas humidity.
Titulo: Comparing the performance of a 13X zeolite and an impregnated activated carbon for H2S removal from biogas to fuel an SOFC: Influence of water

Sentencas: The presence of humidity in the gas dramatically degraded the performance of Z but significantly improved that of IAG.
Titulo: Comparing the performance of a 13X zeolite and an impregnated activated carbon for H2S removal from biogas to fuel an SOFC: Influence of water

Sentencas: This could be due to differences in adsorbent affinity for water.
Titulo: Comparing the performance of a 13X zeolite and an impregnated activated carbon for H2S removal from biogas to fuel an SOFC: Influence of water

Sentencas: In appropriate humidity conditions, the efficiency of IAC proved to be better than that of Z. Recommendations made from lab-scale experiments were taken into account for on-site tests with landfill gas.
Titulo: Comparing the performance of a 13X zeolite and an impregnated activated carbon for H2S removal from biogas to fuel an SOFC: Influence of water

Sentencas: The H2S adsorption capacity of Z was 142 mg(H2s)/g(z).
Titulo: Comparing the performance of a 13X zeolite and an impregnated activated carbon for H2S removal from biogas to fuel an SOFC: Influence of water

Sentencas: An excellent removal of H2S by IAC was demonstrated.
Titulo: Comparing the performance of a 13X zeolite and an impregnated activated carbon for H2S removal from biogas to fuel an SOFC: Influence of water

Sentencas: The complex biogas matrix seemed to enhance IAC efficiency, as the quantity of H2S adsorbed was 785 mg(H2s)/g(IAC) without reaching saturation of the adsorbent.
Titulo: Comparing the performance of a 13X zeolite and an impregnated activated carbon for H2S removal from biogas to fuel an SOFC: Influence of water
